text: Night Without Sleep is a 1952 American mystery thriller movie directed by Roy Ward Baker and starring Gary Merrill, Linda Darnell, Hildegarde Neff, Hugh Beaumont. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s mystery movies Category:1950s thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Ward Baker
title: Night Without Sleep
